description: This file defines a data model for movie scripts using Pydantic, sets up an agent for generating movie scripts with OpenAI's GPT-4 model, and includes an asynchronous main function to produce a response stream.

classes.name: MovieScript
classes.description: A Pydantic model representing the structure of a movie script, including setting, ending, genre, name, characters, storyline, and rating.

methods.name: main
methods.description: An asynchronous function that invokes the agent to generate a movie script response with streaming enabled.
